title: The.Story.of.China-6.Eps-w.subs-BBC-2016-720p
description:
The Story of China

Michael Wood embarks on a great historical adventure, exploring the stories, people and landscapes that have helped create China's distinctive character and genius over four thousand years.

BBC (2016) - 6 Episodes
 
http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b06ymzy7
_______________________________________

1280x720 resolution

Video Codec h.264
Audio Codec AAC

With subtitles - enjoy !!
_______________________________________

Ancestors
1/6 Michael Wood joins the Qin family reunion as they gather to worship their ancestors.

Silk Roads and China Ships
2/6 Michael Wood looks at China's first great international age under the Tang Dynasty.

The Golden Age
3/6 Michael Wood looks at the Song dynasty era, including its art, inventions and cuisine.

The Ming
4/6 The tale of the Ming dynasty begins with the amazing story of Hongwu, a peasant rebel.

The Last Empire
5/6 The story of China's last empire, the Qing, which lasted from 1644 to 1912.

The Age of Revolution
6/6 Michael Wood investigates three cataclysmic revolutions which shaped modern-day China
